name: Rashood in the Hood
description:
An endless runner featuring Rashood, an Emirati boy running through some landmarks in the UAE, 

Controls: Space to jump. the longer you press space, the higher you jump. 

Programmer: Salam Sibai. 

Visuals: Yara Tarek & Salam Sibai. 

Background music: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UmgPMY2rRrw 

This game was the winning submission of the IGN Middle East game jam.
